definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

sentences.english: Ecclestone said at the Abu Dhabi Grand Prix at the weekend that he had doubts about whether the race would happen.
sentences.chinese: 伯尼说这周末举行的阿布扎比大奖赛也可能被取消。

sentences.english: The company boasts a lot of awards it received at international fairs.
sentences.chinese: 该公司在国际性会展上一举揽获数项大奖。

sentences.english: But AFA is young and it still has a long way to go.
sentences.chinese: 但“亚洲电影大奖”还很年轻，前面的路还很长。

sentences.english: This application won the Hackathon award for "Best Accessibility Application".
sentences.chinese: 该软件赢得了“最佳访问性软件”大奖。

sentences.english: There are a variety of games offered. None of them have encouraging odds.
sentences.chinese: 网站提供有各式游戏，但没有一个是中大奖的好对象。

sentences.english: Gain many prizes for nation. Children all over the world will watch my cartoons.
sentences.chinese: 拿大奖，为国争光，让全世界小孩都看我的动画片。

sentences.english: The Free Press and The Tribune both won prizes for local reporting.
sentences.chinese: 自由报和论坛报同时获得了本地报道大奖。

sentences.english: This will delete your current saved grand prix. Are you sure?
sentences.chinese: 这将删除您当前存盘的大奖赛文件，确认么？
2001年桃园俱乐部秋季500公里大奖赛冠军。

sentences.english: This one was given the grand prize in 1937 in Paris. Hoarfrost on metal looks very beautiful.
sentences.chinese: 1937年，这个机车在巴黎获得了大奖。

sentences.english: 1959 - The first Grammy Awards are announced.
sentences.chinese: 1959年的今天，首届格莱美大奖宣布。

sentences.english: This new exquisite design won a large prize.
sentences.chinese: 这种新巧的设计获得了大奖。

sentences.english: Jiang Wenli more with Golden Eagle TV Festival The show won three awards.
sentences.chinese: 蒋雯丽更凭借此剧在金鹰电视节包揽三项大奖。

sentences.english: In 1992, the ensemble won the Grand Prize of the National Folk Music and Dance Competition.
sentences.chinese: 1992年又在全国民间音乐舞蹈团比赛中荣获大奖。

sentences.english: Car of the Year voters like to go with a winner too.
sentences.chinese: “年度汽车大奖”的投票人也喜欢选出一位赢家。

definition: Golden Lion, award at the Venice Film Festival

pinyin: Ao4 si1 ka3 jin1 xiang4 jiang3
